ğŸ—£  What I discovered was that, with the tide ebbing â€“ as it was at the time when Calvi seemed likely to have been suspended from the rope â€“ it would have been relatively straightforward to bring a vessel in on the same side of the scaffolding as the body was found,  Gallop says

â¡ï¸ With the murder routes, Calvi could have been transported to the bridge â€“ incapacitated or even dead â€“ either in a car, in which case he could have been carried to the towpath then down the ladder on to the scaffolding, or lowered on to it over the river wall; or by boat

ğŸ”´ Next, Gallop turned her attention to the two most likely murder routesâ€™.

 I treated as open the question of whether he could have been incapacitated, or even dead, before he was brought to the scaffolding,  she writes
â¡ï¸ What became apparent was that the two possible suicide routesâ€™ to reach the scaffolding were both highly implausible

âœï¸ Gallop writes:  This reconstruction showed me how hard it would have been for an unfit 62-year-old man to reach the place on the scaffolding where Calviâ€™s body was found, all on his own â€“ with broken bricks in his pockets and in the crotch of his trousers

â¡ï¸  So I arranged to have it erected in my garden and persuaded my husband, Russell â€“ who is roughly the same build as Calvi  â€“ to dress up in some clothing that the Calvi family had provided,  Gallop adds.
âœï¸ Gallop writes:  To determine how he died, I had to work out whether it was possible for Calvi to have climbed on to the scaffolding unassisted

ğŸ’¬ My first piece of good fortune in the investigation came with the scaffolding,  writes Gallop.

 In some cold cases I have worked on, important items have been lost, but amazingly, the scaffolding had been kept intact by the firm that erected it

The foreshore under Blackfriars Bridge is always underwater and the buildersâ€™ scaffolding from which his body had been found hanging had long gone.

Any marks made on the bridgeâ€™s structure would have been washed away or merged with other unconnected marks made since

ğŸ—£ï¸ One of the first things I did was to visit the scene, standard when a crime has just been committed, but this was a whole decade on,  Gallop writes.

ğŸ”There had been very little crime-scene-type investigation.

ğŸ“… Five years after the disaster that claimed 72 lives on June 14 2017, no one has been charged, let alone convicted, for any crime.
